sorcer.service

Interface Executor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccountProvider, ServiceConcatenator, ServiceJobber, ServiceSpacer, ServiceTasker

    public interface Executor
    An top-level common local interface for all service-to-service (S2S) providers in SORCER. Each service accepts a service-oriented message Exertion to be processed locally as the result Service.service(Exertion, Transaction) of and returns it after exerting it.
    Author:
    Mike Sobolewski

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Exertion execute(Exertion exertion, Transaction txn)
      A generic service request as specified by an exertion - a generic service message.
      boolean isAuthorized(Subject subject, Signature signature)
      Returns true if the subject is authorized to execute the exertion.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        Exertion execute(Exertion exertion,
               Transaction txn)
                 throws TransactionException,
                        ExertionException,
                        RemoteException
        A generic service request as specified by an exertion - a generic service message. It can be carried out dynamically and indirectly by any Service peer and directly by a Service matching the exertion's method Signature.
        Parameters:
        exertion - an input exertion
        txn - The transaction (if any) under which to provide service.
        Returns:
        a resulting exertion
        Throws:
        TransactionException - if a transaction error occurs
        ExertionException - if an exertion invocation failed for any reason
        RemoteException

      • isAuthorized

        boolean isAuthorized(Subject subject,
                   Signature signature)
                     throws RemoteException
        Returns true if the subject is authorized to execute the exertion.
        Parameters:
        subject - subject invoking the exertion
        signature - an service reference
        Returns:
        true if authorized, otherwise false
        Throws:
        RemoteException
